translations: n.公爵；（尤指旧时欧洲部份地区小公国的）君主；拳头（dukes）；公爵（种）樱桃
v.<美，非正式>打个明白，打个输赢（duke it out）

phrs.translation: 打架；一决雌雄；用拳头猛击

sentences.sentence: The present duke inherited the title from his father.
sentences.translation: 现在的公爵承袭的是他父亲的爵位。

sentences.sentence: It is unlikely that the Duke was convinced by such specious arguments.
sentences.translation: 公爵不太可能被这种貌似正确的理由说服。
